Hello, I'm Dien-Hoa Truong, a freelancer Data Scientist currently located in Quebec, Canada. I'm experienced in several domains in Data Science, especially computer vision and audio but not limited. I love programming, and math and am a big fan of fast.ai. Here is where I share all the knowledge I discover along my AI journey.

Contact me at dienhoa.t@gmail.com if you want to hire me.

Some achievements:
- fast.ai [regular member](https://forums.fast.ai/u/dhoa/summary)
- winner of [community Kaggle competition](https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/kaggle-pog-series-s01e02)
- winner of [CryCeleb 2023 HuggingFace competition](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2305.00969) on infant cry speaker verification
- built world-class [generative image and deepfake detection](https://sightengine.com/detect-ai-generated-images) for Sightengine
